Package cultura

Class CultureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cultura.CultureManager
  • public class CultureManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for crop management in the respective table of the database. It has methods to insert, remove and update.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CultureManager()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Culture> deleteCulture​(Culture culture)
      Tries to delete a culture by calling the stored procedure apagarCultura with the given parameters.
      void getDBCultures()
      Extracts all records from the cultures table from the database.
      java.util.List<Culture> getListOfCultures()  
      java.util.List<Culture> insertCulture​(Culture culture)
      Insert a new culture into the database.
      void updateCulture​(Culture culture)
      Attempts to update information from a culture in the database by calling the updateCulture stored procedure through the current culture object and another culture object instantiated with the parameters to be modified, supplied as argument.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CultureManager

        public CultureManager()

    • Method Detail

      • getListOfCultures

        public java.util.List<Culture> getListOfCultures()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the cultures in the database;

      • getDBCultures

        public void getDBCultures()
        Extracts all records from the cultures table from the database.

      • insertCulture

        public java.util.List<Culture> insertCulture​(Culture culture)
        Insert a new culture into the database. If the culture does not have an ID it will be assigned one automatically by the database auto-increment.
        Parameters:
        culture - the culture to be inserted.
        Returns:
        a list of cultures

      • updateCulture

        public void updateCulture​(Culture culture)
        Attempts to update information from a culture in the database by calling the updateCulture stored procedure through the current culture object and another culture object instantiated with the parameters to be modified, supplied as argument.
        Parameters:
        culture - object corresponding to the culture and his new information.

      • deleteCulture

        public java.util.List<Culture> deleteCulture​(Culture culture)
        Tries to delete a culture by calling the stored procedure apagarCultura with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        culture - is the object culture that we want to delete.
        Returns:
        a list of cultures
